sentences.sContent: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.sCn: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.sContent: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.sCn: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ prise(奖赏) → 奖赏包含大家的努力 → 包含

trans.tranOther: to consist of particular parts, groups etc
